title: The Reading Warehouse
description: Welcome to one of the largest book websites in the world and the most complete website for schools to look-up, research and order books online. The only website that offers a complete Lexile search to help teachers, parents and students find books.
cleaned_text: Clearance Books! Visit our Bargain Bin and save up to 90% everyday! Great Titles - Great Prices! Retail: $9.99 $2.19 78% T e s t i n g P e n c i l s Scholastic Teaching Resources [See All](scholastic.php) Welcome to The Reading Warehouse! If this is your first visit, please take special notice of our payment methods. We accept major credit cards & purchase orders. If your organization doesn't permit you to charge orders over the internet, you can even enter your order online and then call in with your credit or procurement card - What could be safer! Please come on in and look around! We're sure we've got what you're looking for. The Reading Warehouse - We've Got Reading Covered
